dim.name: nIsoLevelsT
dim.description: Number of isobaric levels to which temperature will be vertically interpolated

dim.name: nIsoLevelsZ
dim.description: Number of isobaric levels to which height will be vertically interpolated

dim.name: t_iso_levels
dim.description: Isobaric levels to which temperature will be vertically interpolated

dim.name: z_iso_levels
dim.description: Isobaric levels to which height will be vertically interpolated

dim.name: u_iso_levels
dim.description: Isobaric levels to which winds will be vertically interpolated

var.name: mslp
var.description: Mean sea-level pressure

var.name: zgeo_isobaric
var.description: Geopotential height interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: t_isobaric
var.description: Temperature interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: meanT_500_300
var.description: Mean temperature in the 300 hPa - 500 hPa layer

var.name: t_iso_levels
var.description: Levels for vertical interpolation of temperature to isobaric surfaces

var.name: z_iso_levels
var.description: Levels for vertical interpolation of height to isobaric surfaces

var.name: u_iso_levels
var.description: Levels for vertical interpolation of winds to isobaric surfaces

var.name: z_isobaric
var.description: Height interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in z_iso_levels

var.name: cldfrac_isobaric
var.description: Horizontal cloud fraction interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: temperature_isobaric
var.description: Temperature interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: dewpoint_isobaric
var.description: Dewpoint temperature interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: relhum_isobaric
var.description: Relative humidity interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: w_isobaric
var.description: Vertical velocity interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in u_iso_levels

var.name: uzonal_isobaric
var.description: Reconstructed zonal wind at cell centers, interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in u_iso_levels

var.name: umeridional_isobaric
var.description: Reconstructed meridional wind at cell centers, interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in u_iso_levels

var.name: vorticity_isobaric
var.description: Relative vorticity at vertices interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: height_isobaric
var.description: Geometric height interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: spechum_isobaric
var.description: Specific humidity interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: omega_isobaric
var.description: Omega interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: rqvblten_isobaric
var.description: Tendency of meridional wind due to pbl processes interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: rthblten_isobaric
var.description: Tendency of potential temperature due to pbl processes interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: rqvcuten_isobaric
var.description: Tendency of water vapor mixing ratio due to cumulus convection interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: rthcuten_isobaric
var.description: Tendency of potential temperature due to cumulus convection interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: rthratenlw_isobaric
var.description: Tendency of potential temperature due to long wave radiation interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: rthratensw_isobaric
var.description: Tendency of potential temperature due to short wave radiation interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: rucuten_isobaric
var.description: Tendency of zonal wind due to cumulus convection interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: rvcuten_isobaric
var.description: Tendency of meridional wind due to cumulus convection interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: rvblten_isobaric
var.description: Tendency of meridional wind due to pbl processes interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: rublten_isobaric
var.description: Tendency of zonal wind due to pbl processes interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: kzq_isobaric
var.description: Vertical diffusion coefficient of water vapor and cloud condensates interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: kzh_isobaric
var.description: Vertical diffusion coefficient of potential temperature interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: kzm_isobaric
var.description: Vertical diffusion coefficient of mommentum interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: ni_isobaric
var.description: Cloud ice number concentration interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: nr_isobaric
var.description: Rain number concentration interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: qr_isobaric
var.description: Rain water mixing ratio interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: qs_isobaric
var.description: Snow mixing ratio interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: qv_isobaric
var.description: Water vapor mixing ratio interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: qc_isobaric
var.description: Cloud water mixing ratio interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: qg_isobaric
var.description: Graupel mixing ratio interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels

var.name: qi_isobaric
var.description: Ice mixing ratio interpolated to isobaric surfaces defined in t_iso_levels
